Integration
  • Submitting Device Apps to Stores

Brightcove Zencoder Documentation

Zencoder offers a fast and reliable transcoding service for video and audio files, as well as live streams. It can produce outputs for the web and a wide variety of devices, and can easily be integrated with your CMS and other applications.
